mapper.select: select TERMINAL_IP, TERMINAL_ID, TERMINAL_NAME, TERMINAL_PORT, TERMINAL_PASS, STATUS,USER_ID,TERMINAL_TITLE from PUBLIC.TB_TERMINAL where TERMINAL_ID = #{terminalId}
select TERMINAL_IP, TERMINAL_ID, TERMINAL_NAME, TERMINAL_PORT, TERMINAL_PASS, STATUS,USER_ID,TERMINAL_TITLE from PUBLIC.TB_TERMINAL where USER_ID = #{userId}
select TERMINAL_IP, TERMINAL_ID, TERMINAL_NAME, TERMINAL_PORT, TERMINAL_PASS, STATUS,USER_ID,TERMINAL_TITLE from PUBLIC.TB_TERMINAL limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into PUBLIC.TB_TERMINAL(TERMINAL_NAME, TERMINAL_PORT, TERMINAL_PASS, STATUS,USER_ID,TERMINAL_TITLE,TERMINAL_IP) values (#{terminalName}, #{terminalPort}, #{terminalPass}, #{status},#{terminalTitle},#{terminalIp})
mapper.update:
update PUBLIC.TB_TERMINAL
TERMINAL_NAME = #{terminalName},
TERMINAL_IP = #{terminalIp},
TERMINAL_TITLE = #{terminalTitle},
USER_ID = #{userId},
TERMINAL_PORT = #{terminalPort},
TERMINAL_PASS = #{terminalPass},
STATUS = #{status},
where TERMINAL_ID = #{terminalId}
